sitemapIndexFileSection.title: Main sitemap file
sitemapIndexFileSection.description: Main sitemap file references all other sitemap files: language sitemaps and dedicated sitemaps.

sitemapIndexURLSection.title: Sitemap root URL
sitemapIndexURLSection.description: Add public root URL of your site, for instance: https://www.jahia.com. Please note that the sitemap files won't be available when your server name is set to localhost.

updateIntervalSection.title: Update interval
updateIntervalSection.description: Sitemap files are cached by Jahia. Define the frequency at which the cache will be flushed so that search engines can access the latest information about your pages.

triggerSitemapJob.title: Generate sitemap
triggerSitemapJob.description: If you recently published a lot of changes on your site, you may want to manually generate a new sitemap file.

submitToGoogle.title: Submit to search engines
submitToGoogle.description: Submit your sitemap-index to search engines. You should only use it when adding a new language to your site or when a new dedicated sitemap has been added.

snackbar.errorActivation: Sitemap not saved as {{hostname}} is not a valid url
